DADOS-GERAIS.NOME-EM-CITACOES-BIBLIOGRAFICAS: RABI, J. A.;Rabi, Josй A.;RABI, JOSЙ;RABI, J.A.;RABI, JOSЙ ANTONIO

RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Graduaзгo em Fнsica Aplicada (USP, 1995), Mestrado em Engenharia Mecвnica (ITA, 1998), Doutorado em Engenharia Mecвnica (UNICAMP, 2002), Livre-Docкncia em modelagem & simulaзгo de processos agroindustriais (USP, 2012), Pуs-Doutorado em fenфmenos de transporte em meios porosos (University of Calgary, Canadб, 2003-2004), Pesquisador Visitante em modelagem & simulaзгo de processamento tйrmico de alimentos (CEMAGREF - atualmente IRSTEA, Franзa, 2009-2010). Vinculado ao Departamento de Engenharia de Biossistemas, Universidade de Sгo Paulo - campus Pirassununga, com pesquisas em modelagem computacional de bioprocessos e biossistemas (ex: cromatografia por bioafinidade, extraзгo de biocompostos, biorreatores para tratamento de efluentes) via mйtodo de Boltzmann em rede (LBM - lattice Boltzmann method). Recentes linhas de pesquisa incluem: oncologia matemбtica, epidemiologia matemбtica e toxicologia computacional. Na graduaзгo leciona Fenфmenos de Transporte, Cбlculo Numйrico, Mйtodos Computacionais Aplicados e Pesquisa Operacional. Na pуs-graduaзгo leciona Otimizaзгo Linear (I e II), Mйtodos Matemбticos para Soluзгo de Equaзхes Diferenciais, Computational Modelling via Lattice Boltzmann Method e Preparaзгo Pedagуgica.
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN: BSc Honours in Applied Physics (University of Sao Paulo, Brazil, 1995), MSc in Mechanical Engineering (Technological Institute of Aeronautics, Brazil, 1998), PhD in Mechanical Engineering (University of Campinas, Brazil, 2002), Postgraduate Habilitation in modelling & simulation of agroindustrial processes (University of Sao Paulo, Brazil, 2012), Postdoctoral Fellow in transport phenomena in porous media (University of Calgary, Canada, 2003-2004), Invited Researcher in modelling & simulation of thermal food processing (CEMAGREF - nowadays IRSTEA, France, 2009-2010). Affiliated to the Department of Biosystems Engineering, University of Sao Paulo - Pirassununga campus. Research interests include computational modelling of bioprocesses and biosystems (e.g. bioaffinity chromatography, biocompounds extraction, biorreactors for wastewater treatment) via lattice Boltzmann method (LBM). Recent research lines comprise: mathematical oncology, mathematical epidemiology, and computational toxicology. Undergraduate teaching entails Transport Phenomena, Numerical Methods, Applied Computational Methods, and Operational Research. Postgraduate teaching includes Linear Optimisation (I & II), Mathematical Methods for Differential Equations, Computational Modelling via Lattice Boltzmann Method, and Pedagogical Preparation.
